name: Salvation of the Dead (Ivan Trtanj)
description:
The Game was created in a 48-hour Game Jam at PISMO Unity Course

Game Designer: Boris Vuković

Level Designer: Ivan Trtanj

Programmer: Ivan Ivković

UI/UX Designer: Petra Stojičić

Game Jam Theme: "After the world ends"

The Salvation of the Dead is a first-person puzzle horror played in a post-apocalyptic world filled with zombies that are slowly becoming more conscious.

The game is focused on the story of one half-conscious zombie who is happy to live in a world full of zombies. He finds out the zombie scientist are making the antidote for zombies and begins his mission to stop the scientist atop the abandoned hospital.

The game may have some bugs!
